p.span: The function of the Coroner’s office is to determine cause, manner and circumstance of death under guidelines established by the
Georgia Death Investigation Act. The coroner works closely with law enforcement and the GBI medical examiner to make this determination.
The coroner’s office responds 24 hours 7 days a week to all deaths that are unexpected, unexplained or unattended by a physician.

div.p:
Jasper County Board of Commissioners Office
126 W. Greene Street, Suite 18
Monticello, GA 31064
Telephone: 706-468-4900
Fax: 706-468-4942

section.h3: Please click below to subscribe to Emergency Notifications on evacuations, missing child reports and other information important to your safety.
